channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What's on the ballot in the first general election since Donald Trump became president
item.description: Donald Trump features prominently in state and local elections happening Tuesday, a year after he retook the White House

item.title: US sanctions North Korean bankers accused of laundering stolen cryptocurrency
item.description: The United States is sanctioning a group of bankers and financial firms accused of laundering money for North Korea

item.title: Boeing may face its first civil trial seeking damages for deadly Ethiopia crash
item.description: More than six years after a Boeing 737 Max crashed in Ethiopia, the first civil trial related to the disaster is set to proceed

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 03-32-40-43-57, Powerball: 18

item.title: Iranians commemorate anniversary of 1979 US embassy takeover at time of tensions
item.description: Iranians have celebrated the anniversary of the 1979 takeover of the U.S. Embassy in Tehran
